```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r,echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
addTiles() %>%
addMarkers(lat=42.361145, lng=	-71.057083,
                popup="Boston, MA, USA") %>%
addMarkers(lat=42.378036, lng=	-71.118340,
                popup="Harvard Library, Cambridge, MA, USA")       

my_map
```
